column2: select bw.sampleId, bw.chr, bl.* from (select top # * from genes order by gene_id) g cross join (select top # * from samples order by newid () ) s inner join bw on bw.sampleid = s.sampleid and bw.chr = g.chr and bw.lo < = g.endLoc and bw.hi > = g.startLoc cross apply dbo.fGetBlocksWigTable (block, g.startLoc, g.endLoc) bl order by bw.sampleid, bw.chr, bl.loselect count (*) from samples
